title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and 28th Regiment forage cap with cap box] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and 28th Regiment forage cap with cap box] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
